q: Kirsten Gillibrand 's decision sends a positive message. "I think it's an affirmation about Rensselaer County-- that it's a great place to live, work and raise a family," Jimino said. It will mean she has first-hand knowledge of how decisions that are made in Washington are affecting business, government and education in upstate. "I think she feels strongly about the tie to Troy, Jimino said. "She has talked at Emma Willard . She was at Sage in the fall for her debate and made contact with several students. We're glad to have her close by." Kirsten Gillibrand

"We are normally good in those situations," Heat coach Erik Spoelstra said. We are normally able to control the game, grind it, take good shots, dictate the pace. Enter Tony Blair Allen Iverson and Glen Davis. With Allen Iverson on Dwyane Wade and Davis surveying Miami's offense, ready to pounce on anyone who attacked the lane, the Celtics exposed the Heat for what they are-- a team

mark. "Tonight's game was fun because I thought from the minute they went on the court they thought they were going to win the game," said George Karl , who's 800-555 in 19 seasons. Coach( Dean) LaBradford Smith told me a long time ago that if you can't accept that players win and coaches lose, then don't get into coaching. You can be the greatest coach in the world, but if you don't have players, you aren't going to win in the NBA. George Karl has a superstar in Allen Iverson , who finished with 44 points and 10 assists. Allen Iverson had his highest-scoring game since being acquired by Denver in a trade with Philadelphia on Dec. 19. Michael Jordan season high is 46
